languages.text: "Джиневри". {n}Кляйн нехотя кивает на соратницу.{/n} "Когда я сменил ее и приступил к осмотру тела — оно уже было изуродовано".
"It was Jinevri." {n}Klein reluctantly nods at his fellow enforcer.{/n} "I relieved her when I came to inspect the corpse, which by then had already been cut up."
languages.original_text: "Джиневри". {n}Кляйн нехотя кивает на соратницу.{/n} "Когда я сменил ее и приступил к осмотру тела — оно уже было изуродовано".

languages.text: « Jinevri, {n}répond Klein en désignant à contrecœur sa collègue.{/n} J'ai pris la relève quand je suis arrivé pour examiner le corps, qui avait déjà été mutilé. »
languages.original_text: "It was Jinevri." {n}Klein reluctantly nods at his fellow enforcer.{/n} "I relieved her when I came to inspect the corpse, which by then had already been cut up."

traits.locale_text: « Jinevri, {n}répond Klein en désignant à contrecœur sa collègue.{/n} J'ai pris la relève quand je suis arrivé pour examiner le corps, qui avait déjà été mutilé. »

languages.text: «Jinevri». {n}Klein asiente hacia su compañera a regañadientes.{/n} «La relevé cuando vine a inspeccionar el cadáver, que para entonces ya había sido mutilado».
languages.original_text: "It was Jinevri." {n}Klein reluctantly nods at his fellow enforcer.{/n} "I relieved her when I came to inspect the corpse, which by then had already been cut up."

traits.locale_text: «Jinevri». {n}Klein asiente hacia su compañera a regañadientes.{/n} «La relevé cuando vine a inspeccionar el cadáver, que para entonces ya había sido mutilado».

languages.text: “是杰尼娃。”{n}克莱因不情愿地向他的同伴点点头。{/n}“我是检查尸体的时候才来替她的班。那个时候，尸体已经被破坏了。”
languages.original_text: "It was Jinevri." {n}Klein reluctantly nods at his fellow enforcer.{/n} "I relieved her when I came to inspect the corpse, which by then had already been cut up."

traits.locale_text: “是杰尼娃。”{n}克莱因不情愿地向他的同伴点点头。{/n}“我是检查尸体的时候才来替她的班。那个时候，尸体已经被破坏了。”

languages.text: 「ジネヴリです」{n}クレインは、しぶしぶと同僚のエンフォーサーを示す。{/n}「死体を調べに来た時、彼女を解放しましたのですが、その時には既に切り刻まれていました」
languages.original_text: "It was Jinevri." {n}Klein reluctantly nods at his fellow enforcer.{/n} "I relieved her when I came to inspect the corpse, which by then had already been cut up."

traits.locale_text: 「ジネヴリです」{n}クレインは、しぶしぶと同僚のエンフォーサーを示す。{/n}「死体を調べに来た時、彼女を解放しましたのですが、その時には既に切り刻まれていました」

languages.text: "Es war Jinevri." {n}Klein weist mit einem Nicken auf die Enforcerin.{/n} "Ich löste sie ab, als ich kam, um die Leiche zu inspizieren, die zu diesem Zeitpunkt bereits zerteilt war.
languages.original_text: "It was Jinevri." {n}Klein reluctantly nods at his fellow enforcer.{/n} "I relieved her when I came to inspect the corpse, which by then had already been cut up."

traits.locale_text: "Es war Jinevri." {n}Klein weist mit einem Nicken auf die Enforcerin.{/n} "Ich löste sie ab, als ich kam, um die Leiche zu inspizieren, die zu diesem Zeitpunkt bereits zerteilt war.

languages.text: "Jinevri." {n}Klein, infazcı meslektaşını başıyla zoraki bir şekilde işaret ediyor.{/n} "Cesedi incelemeye geldiğimde görevi devraldım. Ceset hâlihazırda kesilmişti."
languages.original_text: "It was Jinevri." {n}Klein reluctantly nods at his fellow enforcer.{/n} "I relieved her when I came to inspect the corpse, which by then had already been cut up."
